name: RequestResourceType
title: RequestResourceType
description: A list of all the request resource types defined in this version of the FHIR specification.

concept.definition: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).
A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection.
Healthcare plan for patient or group.
A request for information to be sent to a receiver.
Guidance or advice relating to an immunization.
Ordering of medication for patient or group.
Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request.
A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.
Request for a medication, substance or device.
Prescription for vision correction products for a patient.
